medi:segment.name: Beginning of message
medi:segment.medi:documentation: BGM, A segment to indicate the beginning of a message and to transmit identifying number and type of the message.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate a date and time applying to the whole message, e.g. date and time of document issue.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to specify free form or processable supplementary information, such as reason for delay of delivery or type of storage after discharge.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment to identify a location applying to the entire message, e.g. place of storage after discharge.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments to identify documents related to the consignment.

medi:segment.name: Document/message details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DOC, A segment to specify a document such as bill of lading, waybill, invoice, etc.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to associate date and time with the document.

medi:segment.name: External file link identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EFI, A segment to identify an external file.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to provide additional information for the document.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments to identify the document issuer and related contacts.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment to identify the party's name, address and function.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 3: A group of segments identifying a contact and its communications related to the party.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment to identify a person or department within a party.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment to identify a communication number of a person or department to whom communication should be directed.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 4: A group of segments containing a reference and dates which apply to the entire message.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment to express a reference which applies to the entire message such as: the document/message number that is to be updated by this message, bill of lading number, insurance policy number, reference of insurer, insurance intermediary or policy holder, certificate number, unique market reference, etc.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate date and time relating to the reference, e.g. issue date of bill of lading, cover date of insurance certificate.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 5: A group of segments to indicate details of the movement of goods such as mode and means of transport, locations, departure and arrival date(s) and time(s).

medi:segment.name: Transport information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TDT, A segment to indicate information related to a certain stage of the transport, such as mode, means and carrier.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate departure/arrival date and time.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment to specify capacity of means of transport.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to give information related to this leg of transport such as kind of receipt or report of complaints.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 6: A group of segments to identify a party, such as carrier, consolidator or driver.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment to identify the party's name, address and function.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 7: A group of segments identifying a contact and its communications related to the party.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment to identify a person or department within a party.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment to identify a communication number of a person or department to whom communication should be directed.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 8: A group of segments to specify a location and date/time related to this leg of transport.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment to indicate a location such as origin, destination, stop off, etc. related to this leg of transport.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to specify a date/time related to the location, such as arrival date/time of a means of transport at a specific location.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 9: A group of segments to specify an additional reference related to the stage of the transport.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment to specify the additional reference.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to identify date and time relating to the reference.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 10: A group of segments to identify a party and related contacts, such as consignee, consignor, freight forwarder, insured, insurer, insurance intermediary, party that identified loss, claimant, surveyor, claim adjuster, recovery agent, etc.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment to identify the party's name, address and function.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 11: A group of segments identifying a contact and its communications related to the party.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment to identify a person or department within a party.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment to identify a communication number of a person or department to whom communication should be directed.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 12: A group of segments to describe a loss or damage, claim, or assessment report.

medi:segment.name: Status
medi:segment.medi:documentation: STS, A segment to identify a loss or damage, claim, or assessment report, and to specify status and status reason.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment to specify a reference, e.g. claim reference, claim transaction reference, survey report number.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to identify date and time, e.g. date of loss or damage, date of notification, date of assessment.

medi:segment.name: Insurance cover description
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ICD, A segment to identify the insurance contract guarantee.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment to indicate a place of assessment.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment to specify assessment measurements.

medi:segment.name: Query and response
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QRS, A segment to specify a query and the response regarding the loss or damage, claim, or assessment.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to give information related to the loss or damage, claim, or assessment, such as cause and description of loss/damage, assessment remarks, report of inspection of documents, bill of lading remarks, etc.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 13: A group of segments to specify monetary amounts with currencies and exchange rates.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment to specify a monetary amount, e.g. loss estimate, invoice amount, claim amount, claim handling costs, amount of deductible, salvage amount, fee of surveyor.

medi:segment.name: Currencies
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CUX, A segment to specify the original currency and the exchange rate.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 14: A group of segments to identify documents supporting the processing of the loss or damage, claim, or assessment.

medi:segment.name: Document/message details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DOC, A segment to specify a document such as goods receipt, insurance policy, insurance certificate, survey report, recovery agent report, etc.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to associate date and time with the document.

medi:segment.name: External file link identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EFI, A segment to identify an external file.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to provide additional information for the document.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 15: A group of segments to identify the document issuer and related contacts.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment to identify the party's name, address and function.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 16: A group of segments identifying a contact and its communications related to the party.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment to identify a person or department within a party.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment to identify a communication number of a person or department to whom communication should be directed.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 17: A group of segments to describe the goods item for which transport is undertaken.

medi:segment.name: Goods item details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GID, A segment to identify a goods item for which transport is undertaken. A goods item can be identified by up to three levels of packaging.

medi:segment.name: Additional product id
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PIA, A segment to specify article numbers.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to specify processable supplementary information relating to the goods item.

medi:segment.name: Package identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCI, A segment to specify marks and numbers of a goods item.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 18: A group of segments to specify the distribution of a goods item among the transport equipment.

medi:segment.name: Split goods placement
medi:segment.medi:documentation: SGP, A segment to identify the equipment in which goods are transported.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 19: A group of segments to identify measurements.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment to specify measurements of that portion of goods item in the equipment.

medi:segment.name: Number of units
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EQN, A segment to specify the number of equipment units to each of which the given measurement applies.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 20: A group of segments to specify dangerous goods details related to the goods item. One goods item may be in different dangerous goods classes. A group of segments to specify dangerous goods details related to the goods item. One goods item may be in different dangerous goods classes.

medi:segment.name: Dangerous goods
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DGS, A segment to indicate the class of dangerous goods, packing group, etc.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to specify the dangerous goods technical name and to specify any additional dangerous goods information.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 21: A group of segments to describe loss or damage details, or assessment report details related to a goods item.

medi:segment.name: Status
medi:segment.medi:documentation: STS, A segment to identify a loss or damage, or assessment report, and to specify status and status reason.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment to specify a reference, e.g. survey report number.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to identify date and time, e.g. date of assessment.

medi:segment.name: Insurance cover description
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ICD, A segment to identify the insurance contract guarantee.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment to indicate a place of assessment.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment to specify assessment measurements, such as number of packages, weight of damaged goods, weight of undamaged goods.

medi:segment.name: Query and response
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QRS, A segment to specify a query and the response regarding the loss or damage or assessment.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to give information related to the loss or damage or assessment, such as cause and description of loss/damage, assessment remarks, condition of goods, condition of packaging, etc.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 22: A group of segments to specify monetary amounts with currencies and exchange rates.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment to specify a monetary amount, e.g. loss estimate, invoice amount, salvage amount, market value.

medi:segment.name: Currencies
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CUX, A segment to specify the original currency and the exchange rate.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 23: A group of segments to identify documents supporting the processing of the loss or damage or assessment.

medi:segment.name: Document/message details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DOC, A segment to specify a document such as weight certificate, certificate of origin, survey report, etc.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to associate date and time with the document.

medi:segment.name: External file link identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EFI, A segment to identify an external file.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to provide additional information for the document.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 24: A group of segments to identify the document issuer and related contacts.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment to identify the party's name, address and function.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 25: A group of segments identifying a contact and its communications related to the party.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment to identify a person or department within a party.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment to identify a communication number of a person or department to whom communication should be directed.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 26: A group of segments to specify equipment in which goods are transported.

medi:segment.name: Equipment details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EQD, A segment to specify equipment, and equipment size and type used in the transport.

medi:segment.name: Number of units
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EQN, A segment to specify the number of pieces of equipment required.

medi:segment.name: Transport movement details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TMD, A segment to specify transport movement details for the equipment.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment to specify measurements, other than dimensions, associated with the equipment, such as weight.

medi:segment.name: Dimensions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DIM, A segment to specify dimensions applicable to equipment.

medi:segment.name: Seal number
medi:segment.medi:documentation: SEL, A segment to identify seal and seal issuer associated with the equipment.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment to indicate a place of unloading.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to specify processable supplementary information associated with the equipment such as condition of equipment, condition of seal, assessment remarks, etc.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 27: A group of segments to identify parties responsible for unloading or removal of seal.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment to identify the party's name, address and function.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 28: A group of segments to identify a contact and its communications related to the party.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment to identify a person or department within a party.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment to identify a communication number of a person or department to whom communication should be directed.
